value.name: Spear, Ronald Neal
value.description: Ronald Neal Spear, 57, a lifelong resident of Chattanooga, faithful husband, father, poppy, brother, uncle and churchmember, died on Friday, February 19, 2010. He was deacon at Calvary Bible ...

value.name: UPDATE: Bibb jury continues deliberations in murder trial
value.description: Fletcher said the police have kept photo albums of documented gang members. McKenzie, Ronald Neal and Akbar Harclerode were in the album, Fletcher said. He said the gang is still in existence ...
